channel.title: Apache: Flying impenetrable fortress?
channel.description: I don't know if anyone else felt this way but the helicopters seemed absurdly difficult to destroy, I'm talking 6-7 rockets absurd. Why its it (much) easier to destroy a truly heavily armored M1 tank than the attack helicopter which (from a reality perspective) has to be light enough to get off the ground and fly?

item.title: Apache: Flying impenetrable fortress?
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
I like it that way; the gunships in HL2 always went down waaay too fast for me.

Read full topic

item.title: Apache: Flying impenetrable fortress?
item.dc:creator: YouKnow
item.description:
That’s only a couple more than the gunship in HL2 I believe. What difficulty are you playing on?

item.title: Apache: Flying impenetrable fortress?
item.dc:creator: theyarecomingforyou
item.description:
The Tau Cannon is incredibly effective at taking them down. I didn’t have any issue, though they are certainly more mobile than in the original game.

item.description:

item.title: Apache: Flying impenetrable fortress?

item.description:
